tidybinds.configuration.category_order.t:
Define the display order of categories in the §7Key Binds§f screen.

Format: §6category;index§f

Example: §6key.categories.inventory;1§f

Lower indices appear higher in the list.

Use §7Print Categories§f to discover category names.
tidybinds.configuration.Debug.tooltip: Utilities for finding names and debugging configuration issues.
tidybinds.configuration.disable_conflict:
Disable the red highlighting on keybinds that share the same key.

Useful when you intentionally want multiple actions bound to one key.
tidybinds.configuration.display_hidden_k: Display hidden keys in a special §7Hidden Keys§f category instead of removing them.
tidybinds.configuration.entry_spacing.to: Additional spacing (in pixels) between entries in the §7Key Binds§f screen.
tidybinds.configuration.General.tooltip: Core features for organizing keys, hiding entries, and creating combinations.
tidybinds.configuration.hidden_keys.tool:
Keys to remove from the §7Key Binds§f screen.

Format: §6key§f

Example: §6key.jump§f

Use §7Print Keys§f to discover key names.
tidybinds.configuration.key_categories.t:
Move specific keys into custom or existing categories.

Format: §6key;category§f

Example: §6key.jump;key.categories.inventory§f

Custom categories should be translated via a resource pack.

Use §7Print Categories§f to discover category names.
tidybinds.configuration.key_combinations:
Trigger multiple keys with a single button press.

Format: §6trigger_key;linked_key,another_linked_key§f

Example: §6key.jump;key.sneak,key.sprint§f

Linked keys are automatically hidden.

Use §7Print Keys§f to discover key names.
tidybinds.configuration.key_overrides.to:
Override default keybinds. When §7Reset§f is pressed, keys reset to these values instead of vanilla defaults.

Format: §6key;input§f

Example: §6key.jump;key.keyboard.space§f

Use §6key.keyboard.unknown§f to set no default.

Use §7Print Keys§f to discover key names.
tidybinds.configuration.log_actions.tool: Log §7Tidy Binds§f actions (e.g., §6Moving key X to category Y§f) to the console.
tidybinds.configuration.print_categories: Print all available category names (e.g., §6key.categories.inventory§f) to the console.
tidybinds.configuration.print_keys.toolt: Print all available key names (e.g., §6key.attack§f) to the console.
tidybinds.configuration.title: §lTidy Binds
tidybinds.configuration.unbind_hidden_ke:
Disable hidden keys by setting them to §6key.keyboard.unknown§f.

This prevents hidden keys from conflicting with visible bindings.
